segments.text: Well , I'm afraid I must be going now . I have no idea it was so late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid I can't . I have a dinner party at seven tonight . You see , I am going to England the day after tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I won't keep you then . It was very nice of you to come to see me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It has been a pleasure . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Goodbye . Thank you again for coming .
segments.speaker: S2
